data.name: Berserk Mode
data.detailed_description:
Sometimes to beat the monsters, you have to be the monster. Inspired by classic shooters and modern rogue-likes and -lites, Berserk Mode is an intense run-based shooter with a focus on transformations and high-speed mayhem.

As the Berserker, you must race through deadly fiend-filled zones while your life force drains away. Slaughtering foes restores your health, and builds your
rage to the point that you can transform into mythical beasts - and beyond. Receive curses in exchange for golden rewards, which you can spend on vicious weapons, powerful enchantments and exotic artifacts. Use every advantage at your disposal in this nightmarish challenge that will push your skills - and your humanity, to the very edge.

GO BERSERK


Race against the clock and bring sudden death to hordes of twisted fiends.

BECOME A MONSTER


When your bloodlust hits maxes out, transform into legendary beasts to tear your foes apart.

GET STRONGER


Precious experience expands body and mind. Customise your kit with exotic loadout equipment and Artifacts.

GET IN THE ZONE


Lose yourself in an ever-changing ode to slaughter. Enter Berserk Mode.

Game Features

- Time-attack shooter rogue-lite gameplay, full runs take around 30 mins


- Unique beast transformation mechanic with customisable beast weapons

- Risk deadly curses and alternate zones in exchange for mountains of gold

- 20+ devastating weapons

- 3 playable classes: Berserker, Brigand and Stalwart

- 5 Unlockable 'Descension' Difficulty Settings

- Procedurally generated levels

- Hand-drawn pixel graphic violence

- Original soundtrack by Cletus Lupus



Berserk Mode is inspired by old school shooters from the Duke/Doom era, and modern rogue-like and rogue-lite games that focus on contained play sessions and fun/OP run synergies. Berserk Mode is intended to be a game you can pick up and bash for half an hour to let off some steam, but with enough depth and variety to keep you coming back for more. on the rogue-lite spectrum, I would say it's lighter on meta-progression and more heavily rewards skill and knowledge of the game. Please enjoy your time in Berserk Mode!!

Cheers!
Adam (Berserk Mode Dev)

data.short_description: Berserk Mode is a visceral time-attack fantasy roguelite. Become the Berserker and unleash the awesome power of your beast within. Navigate the sublime depths of your battle-trance in a storm of blood and gibs. Prepare to enter Berserk Mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel i5+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 990 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel i7+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics / AMD Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel i5+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB integrated or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel i7+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB integrated or better

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a stylised depiction of extreme violence against fantasy monsters.
